Junk removal with grit, care, and great beards.

Bearded Junk Removal helps Tucson and Vail homeowners, property managers, and contractors clear out clutter without lifting a finger. Same-day and next-day service available across Southeast Arizona.

Call (555) 123-4567

Need a quote? Send us the details and we’ll respond within an hour during business hours.

What We Haul

Residential Junk

Furniture, appliances, mattresses, yard waste, hot tubs, play sets, and the odds and ends cluttering up your home.

Commercial Cleanouts

Office furniture, retail fixtures, construction debris, warehouse cleanouts, eviction turnovers, and storage unit clear-outs.

Specialty Pickups

Estate cleanouts, hoarder situations, remodeling debris, storm damage, and donation delivery to local partners.

The Bearded Process

  1. Snap + Schedule

    Text photos or describe your junk pile. We send a firm estimate and schedule a pickup that works for you.

  2. Friendly Arrival

    Our crew shows up on time with smiles, beards, and the right equipment. We protect your property and work fast.

  3. Responsible Disposal

    We sort, donate, recycle, and properly dispose of every item. You only pay for the space your junk takes up on the truck.

Service Area

Based in Vail, AZ, we serve neighbors across the greater Tucson area. Not sure if we reach you? Ask us—we’re on the road across Southeast Pima County every day.

Common Questions

How does pricing work?

Pricing is based on the volume your items take up in our trucks. We quote before we start, so there are zero surprises.

Do I need to move anything?

Nope. Point to what goes and we’ll safely remove it from wherever it is—attics, basements, backyards, or job sites.

What items can't you take?

We can’t haul hazardous materials like paint, oil, chemicals, or propane. We’re happy to recommend proper disposal resources.
